language.title: HTML5 Boilerplate
language.teaser: Contao with jQuery and the HTML5 Boilerplate.
language.description:
This extension integrates the HTML5 Boilerplate including the option of using jQuery into Contao. You'll have the option to set the doctype to HTML5 and you can use the fe_html5_page.tpl and the new moo_ templates in the page layout to basically "jqeryfy" your page and use all the crazy goodness that Paul Irish and his team built into the boilerplate. 

Check http://html5boilerplate.com for the lowdown.
language.releasenotes: This is the first version integrating HTML5 Boilerplate 0.9.5, jQuery 1.4.3 and modernizr 1.6.

language.title: HTML5 Boilerplate
language.teaser: Contao mit Paul Irishs HTML5 Boilerplate
language.description: Integriert das HTML5 Boilerplate 0.9.5 mit Contao mit jQuery 1.4.3 und modernizr 1.6.
